messages.messageBody:
I am new to this newsletter and I am enjoying it very much. I find the data
and discussions very informative. I was wondering if the exhibit that
currently on display in Boston will be making its way to New York any time in the
near future? Any information is greatly appreciated.


Mike


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
